overview:
Vinod has over 18 years of experience in engineering and technology management. At Pricelock he oversees all projects and programs by interfacing between the Product, Marketing, Engineering and Sales teams to ensure project deliverables are on track. Prior to joining Pricelock, he worked for ETRADE Financial for over 11 years. At ETRADE, he was Director of Software Engineering responsible for wealth management and retail portfolio technology and project management. Vinod is also actively involved with a various charities and non-profit organizations.

Vinod holds a BS in Industrial Engineering from University of Bombay.
